alert.note: Alert for Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurel, east central Pulaski and southeastern Rockcastle Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Luner to Ruth. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sand Hill, Luner, Pongo, Hansford, Bloss and Billows around 300 PM EDT. Valley Oak around 305 PM EDT. Camp Wildcat, Hazel Patch, Wood Creek Lake and Bernstadt around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lamero, Mershons, Victory, Mount Victory, Hare and East Bernstadt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
